meanings.definition: A collection of logs or pieces of wood fastened together for floating on water.
meanings.sent1: The raftings were securely tied together to form a stable platform.
meanings.sent2: We used the raftings to cross the river safely.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous beavers used the raftings to build their dam.
